title: Strategies for Enhancing Usability of Content Management Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental smartphone usage skills and internet utilization experience
context.additional_context: Foundational Training Course for Efficient Use of a Mathematics Learning Content Management System, Structured Primarily Around Smartphone-Based Practical Exercises (No PC Environment Required)

learning_goals: Learners can identify 10 CMS interface elements and explain their functional purposes
Learners can systematically organize mathematics content by applying a three-tier navigation structure
Learners can propose CMS improvements by applying five usability evaluation criteria (readability, accessibility, navigability, response speed, error management)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
